description:
.NET Core is a blazing fast, lightweight and modular platform for creating web applications and services that run on Windows, Linux and Mac.

The SDK includes the runtime and command line tools for creating .NET Core applications.

This is a *metapackage*, which installs the latest release of .NET Core 3.1 SDK across all feature updates.
summary: The SDK includes the runtime and command line tools for creating .NET Core applications.
author: Microsoft
